preconditions: User is on the login page
User has a valid username and password
main_flow: 4. System checks username and password against database (S1)
5. If credentials are valid (S2-Yes), system displays success message (S3)
6. System grants access to secure area (S4)
7. User can now interact with secure area functionalities
If credentials are invalid (S2-No), system displays error message (S5)
postconditions: Secure area is accessible only after successful login
Users can logout from secure area when needed.
